cause.description:
It is believed that by incouraging young palestinian to return to their home land , to live and participate in comunity, we will make palestine a better place to live.
as requested by UPA I post the following :“UPA is a humanitarian non-political organization with a mission to alleviate the suffering of Palestinians. United Palestinian Appeal does not endorse this cause and is in no way responsible for its content.”
1. all palestineans living or studying abroad should return to their home land
cause.mission: encourage young palestinians to return to their homeland
cause.name: I shall return to gaza no matter what !!!
